message: Registry analysis complete. WRONG registry: 4 tasks (Oct 17-18), 27 total agents (5 active). PROPER registry: 5 tasks (Oct 15-17), 22 total agents (16 active). NO TASK ID OVERLAP - all 9 tasks are unique. However, agent IDs overlap detected: 3 agents appear in both registries (workspace_path_investigator-213147-db6fbe, resolve_function_analyzer-213149-a5f24b, impact_assessor-213152-49c64c) with identical data. Merge strategy: combine all 9 unique tasks, deduplicate agents keeping latest timestamp.

REGISTRY MERGE COMPLETE. Successfully unified split registries into single source of truth. Merged 9 unique tasks (4 from wrong + 5 from proper), 49 agents (deduplicated 3 overlaps). Created backups of both original registries for safety. Zero data loss. Deliverable: registry_merge_report.md with full before/after analysis, conflict resolution strategy, and verification results.
